title: Repairing the Highndry
setting: Scout/Courier Highndry, crater of Mount Salbarii
atmosphere: Cramped ship interior, evidence of neglect everywhere. Previous crew left mess and damage. Methodical repair work in confined spaces. Relief at finally reaching the ship, tempered by the scope of work needed.
description: Systematic repair of Highndry's damaged control electronics. Four systems need circuit panel replacement, plus computer purge and software upload. Habitability also needs attention.
objectives: Purge computer and upload temporary software

systems_to_repair.name: Computer
systems_to_repair.notes: Purge corrupted data, upload temporary software

habitability_notes.condition: Trashy - previous crew left mess everywhere
habitability_notes.cleaning_time: Several days to make properly comfortable

survey_equipment.status: Previous crew didn't tamper with survey gear

narrator_prompt: The Highndry is a mess - evidence of the previous crew's poor maintenance and hasty departure. But under the grime, she's a sturdy Scout/Courier. The repair kit has everything needed. It's just a matter of methodical work, one system at a time.
